title: Cupcakes and Cupids
description: Analeigh was on her way to make her first big delivery for her cupcake company, Let Them Eat Cake.Everything was perfect. That was until she was in a hit and run accident leaving her cupcakes as road kill.Analeigh thought there was no way she could save her cupcakes or her Valentine’s Day.But, she hadn’t met Danny yet.
author: Jennifer Conner
